Html:
Is there any way to optimise things when using large definition files such as winrt.d.ts

http://typescript.codeplex.com/SourceControl/changeset/view/fe3bc0bfce1f#typings%2fwinrt.d.ts

The file is a chunky definition, over a meg, and it can cause the IDE to slow down a bit.
We're actively working to improve this.  I'll add this to the issue tracker, so we can track there.
